name: Delphinus - Creative Multi-Purpose eCommerce HTML5
intro: Thank you for your purchasing this template. If you have any questions that are beyond the scope of this help file, please feel free to email us via our user page contact form.

sections.title: FAQ
sections.content:
How to enable/ disable loading page?

If you want to enable loading page in your pages, add the following code in the head tag.

  1. <!-- Javascript Page Loader -->
  2. <script type="text/javascript" src="assets/js/pace.min.js" data-pace-options='{ "ajax": false }'></script>
  3. <script type="text/javascript" src="assets/js/page-loading.js"></script>

 

How can I get homepage sliders?

Click here to get the Text you need to copy

 

Click here to get the Text you need to copy

 

Click here to get the Text you need to copy

sections.title: HTML Structure
sections.content:
This template, which is a responsive layout for tablet and other mobile devices, is based on the HTML5 structure and Twitter Bootstrap 3. Visit http://getbootstrap.com/ to learn more about Bookstrap. For a detailed information about its grid system, click on http://getbootstrap.com/css/#grid.

 

The general HTML structure should appear in the following format.


<div id="page">
    <header id="header" class="header-shadow header-full-center">
        <div class="topbar">
            <!-- HEADER CONTENT GOES HERE (logo, page info, menu, ribbon, etc) -->
        </div>
    </header>
    <div class="page-section bg-gray small-section">
        <div class="page-header">
            <!-- PAGE TITLE SECTION(Inner section) -->
        </div>
    </div>
    <div id="main">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-sm-9">
                    <!-- MAIN CONTENT GOES HERE (search box, etc) -->
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-3 side-bar side-bar-right">
                    <!-- SIDEBAR CONTENT GOES HERE -->
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
        <footer id="footer-top">
            <!-- FOOTER TOP CONTENT GOES HERE -->
        </footer>
        <footer id="footer-area">
            <!-- FOOTER AREA CONTENT GOES HERE -->
        </footer>
        <div class="footer-copyright">
            <!-- LOGO, COPYRIGHT, BACK TO TOP, etc -->
        </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

sections.title: CSS Structure
sections.content:
This template uses SCSS for stylesheets. For more information about SCSS, visit http://sass-lang.com/guide.

We need to compile SCSS files to CSS to make them usable.

  • style.scss - Main style file (all styles are located in this file)
  • responsive.scss - This stylesheet contains responsive rules for adapting the template to any resolution.
  • custom.scss - Custom style file. We would recommend you to write your rules and style declarations here.
  • updates.scss - Updated styles for further versions
  • ie.scss - This stylesheet contains the fixes for Internet Explorer browser (exactly IE8, 9)
  • _mixin.scss - We have defined mixins for its use in style.scss. Therefore, there is no no need to compile this file.
  • _variables.scss - This file defines variables which are used in style.scss. For more information, please check the Customization section.

sections.title: Javascript
sections.content:
This template imports several JS files.

The Javascript  files are loaded in the footer.

The Javascript files used in this template are the following:

  1. jQuery library
  2. Bootstrap JS
  3. Main scripts (main.js) - It contains all the scripts we are using in the template. To get a detailed understanding of this, please have a look at this file that contains an explanation written in comment.
  4. Other Javascript plugins (Check details in the Sources section)

sections.title: Customization
sections.content:
Changing Logo

Change a default logo by changing logo.png and logo@2x.png in the /images directory, or by opening each of the pages and changing the following code.



    
	
  1. 
		<div class="branding">
    2. 
	
  2. 
		<h1 class="logo">
    3. 
	
  3. 
		<a href="index.html"><img src="images/logo@2x.png" alt=""><span>Miracle</span></a>
    4. 
	
  4. 
		</h1>
    5. 
	
  5. 
		</div>
    6. 



	Currently, we have 10 skin colors and each one of these uses its own logo.If you opt for a skin color other than the default, change the logo in /images/logo/{color skin}/logo.png and logo@2x.png.


	The logo is 26px in height by default. If you want to change the logo height, please add the following css code in the /css/custom.css. (Change 26px with your logo height.)




    
	
  1. 
		#header .logo { background-size: auto 26px; }
    2. 
	
  2. 
		#header .logo img { height: 26px; }
    3. 
	
  3. 
		#header .logo span { line-height: 26px; }
    4. 
	
  4. 
		@media all and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5), all and (-o-min-device-pixel-ratio: 3 / 2), all and (min--moz-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5), all and (min-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5) {
    5. 
	
  5. 
		#header .logo { background-size: auto 26px; }
    6. 
	
  6. 
		}
    7. 




	Changing fonts


	We are using Google Open Sans font by default.


	To change the embedded font, look for the tag below in the head tag of your website.




    
	
  1. 
		<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,300,600,700' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
    2. 



	Once you see the $font-stack variable in /scss/_variables.scss, change the value of which and compile the style again.




    
	
  1. 
		$font-stack: 'Open Sans', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    2. 



	In addition to this default font, we are using several other google fonts for some html components.



	Changing color skins


	This template is ready to support unlimited skin colors, for which we use SCSS to process the CSS dynamically and show the color right away.


	You can change colors in _variables.scss.


	You need to comment current variables and uncomment these variables.


	Anyway we have 10 skin colors by default as mentioned earlier. If you want to use skin2, you can change style.css to precompiled style-green.css.




    
	
  1. 
		<link id="main-style" rel="stylesheet" href="css/style-green.css">
    2. 



	Otherwise you can compile skin2 using variables(_variables.scss).


	You need to comment current variables and uncomment these variables.




    
	
  1. 
		/* 6. Skin 2(Green) */
    2. 
	
  2. 
		$theme-skin-logo: $theme-skin2-logo;
    3. 
	
  3. 
		$theme-skin-color: $theme-skin-green;
    4. 
	
  4. 
		$theme-skin-light-bgcolor: #a2d13a;
    5. 
	
  5. 
		$theme-skin-light-fontcolor: #d8eaaf;
    6. 



	You don't need to use SCSS in your project, after you are done with customizing your skin you may want to grab the generated code and save it in a file in the folder: /css/style-(color-name).css



	Changing header color


	The header has transparent background and black color by default.


	To change header font color to white, please add "header-color-white" class to the header as follows.




    
	
  1. 
		<header id="header" class="header-color-white">
    2. 




	Changing menu style


	There are 3 menu styles; white, dark and colored.


	To change menu style, just change the style class to another you want.


	For more details, please check shortcode-dropdown.html.



	Changing inner style


	There are 6 inner styles.


	To change inner style, you need to change all inner style sections to another style of your choice.


	Please have a look at pages-inner-style1.html,…,pages-inner-style6.html.



	Changing footer style


	There are 4 styles, style1, style2, style3, style4. To change footer style just add the style class to the footer.




    
	
  1. 
		<footer id="footer" class="style4">
    2. 




	Icons


	Font Awesome is a @font-face iconset of which you can change size and color using CSS.

	

	If you need more information, please visit the site: http://fontawesome.io/

sections.title: Sliders and Carousels
sections.content:
Home page slider

There are 7 Home page sliders made using Revolution slider.

For more details of revolution slider, please check http://revolution.themepunch.com/examples-jquery/.



    
	
  1. 
		<div class="revolution-slider">
    2. 
	
  2. 
		…
    3. 
	
  3. 
		</div>
    4. 




	OwlCarousel


    
	
  1. 
		<div id="slideshow">
    2. 



	We can make responsive image carousel using OwlCarousel. http://owlgraphic.com/owlcarousel




    
	
  1. 
		<div class="owl-carousel" data-itemsPerDisplayWidth="[[0, 1], [480, 2], [768, 1], [992, 1], [1200, 1]]" data-items="1" data-transitionStyle=”fade”>
    2. 
	
  2. 
		<a href="#">
    3. 
	
  3. 
		<img src="images/shortcode/button/banner1.jpg" alt="">
    4. 
	
  4. 
		</a>
    5. 
	
  5. 
		<a href="#">
    6. 
	
  6. 
		<img src="images/shortcode/button/banner2.jpg" alt="">
    7. 
	
  7. 
		</a>
    8. 
	
  8. 
		</div>
    9. 




	Attributes:


    	
  • 		data-transitionStyle: “fade” or “slide”
    • 
	
  • 		data-items: This variable allows you to set the maximum amount of items displayed at a time with the widest browser width
    • 
	
  • 		data-itemsPerDisplayWidth: This allows you to add custom variations of items depending on  the width
    •

sections.title: Sources and Credits
sections.content:
Scripts

  • Bootstrap framework 3.0 http://getbootstrap.com/
  • Revolution Slider http://codecanyon.net/item/slider-revolution-responsive-jquery-plugin/2580848

  • Owl Carousel http://owlgraphic.com/owlcarousel
  • Gmap3 - http://gmap3.net/
  • WOW https://github.com/matthieua/WOW
  • Isotope Jquery plugin  (properly licensed) http://isotope.metafizzy.co
  • Magnific Popup http://dimsemenov.com/plugins/magnific-popup/
  • Bootstrap-select https://silviomoreto.github.io/bootstrap-select/
  • Superfish http://users.tpg.com.au/j_birch/plugins/superfish/
  • jQuery Parallax http://ianlunn.co.uk/plugins/jquery-parallax/
  • jQuery Cookie Plugin https://github.com/carhartl/jquery-cookie
  • Product Preview Slider https://codyhouse.co/gem/product-preview-slider/

CSS

  • Font Awesome http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/
  • Bootstrap framework 3.1.1 http://getbootstrap.com/
  • Animate CSS http://daneden.github.io/animate.css/
  • Bootstrap-3-Grid-Columns https://github.com/sixfootsixdesigns/Bootstrap-3-Grid-Columns-Clearing

Images

Any Images or logos used in previews are not included in this item or final purchase and you need to contact authors to get permission in case you want to use them in your commercial or non-commercial projects.

We used http://placehold.it/ for placeholders.
